description:
The hottest car assembly game is now free to download! Build your own car from the ground up with Idle Assemble:Car.
Do you like cars? Do you like to create a car? Do you want to know how a car works and what is needed to get there ? You just need to constantly upgrade your vehicle's components and assemble them into a real car!
***** game features *****
[unlock different vehicle]
Unlock a variety of cars and vehicles. From motorcycles to yachts to sports cars and more!
[expand your collection]
Every upgraded car is your collection, showing off your cars to your friends! Can you collect all the cars?
[Upgrade your car parts]
Upgrade and reinforce your engine, tires, turbo, chassis and gearbox, break through the barriers of resources, unlimited modification of your vehicle, let your car reach your dream shape!
[can be assembled anywhere, anytime]
Even in the work, study or sleeping, also can see your car’s progression. Let you completely feel no pressure!
You've probably played a lot of car games but Idle Assemble :Car brings a lot of different experiences that are almost never seen in other games, so if you want to be a car mechanic or a car assembler, this game is a best choice. You will get different types of cars in the game and being a vehicle master.
Contact us
facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Idle-AssembleCar-106545170955055/
Customer service email:
Barleygame.fanscare@gmail.com
Enjoy and have fun here!

Do you like cars? Do you like to create a car? Do you want to know how a car works and what is needed to get there ? You just need to constantly upgrade your vehicle's components and assemble them into a real car!
